name: 張正春
objective: 通訊系統簡介，類比調變技術（AM，FM），脈波調變技術，數位調變技術。
schedule:
Week	Topic	Memo
1	Overview and history	
2	Fundamental of signals and Fourier series	
3	Fourier series and Fourier transform	
4	Power spectral density and correlation	
5	Signals and linear systems	
6	Sampling theory	
7	Modulation techniques: linear modulation	
8	AM, FM, PLL, PPM, PWM, PCM, and delta modulation	Test01
9	Midterm week	
10	Multiplexing	
11	Review of probability theory	
12	Stochastic process	
13	Correlation and power spectral density	Test02 (暫定)
14	Linear systems and random process 	
15	Narrowband noise	
16	Noise effect in modulation system: SNR and signal degradation	
17	Noise effect of AM, FM, and PCM systems	
18	Final week	Test03
scorePolicy:
測驗一、測驗二、測驗三，最高分40%，其餘30%, 30%。 
(Bonus: 全勤+5%; 期末報告/程式 +5%)
materials:
（一）主要讀本 (Main textbook)：
1.	Rodger E. Ziemer, Principle of Communications Systems, Modulation, and Noise, 7th Edition, John Wiley, 2014. (ISBN: 978-1-118-07891-4)
（二）參考書目 (Other reference)：
1.	John G. Proakis, Contemporary Communication Systems Using Matlab and Simulink, 2nd Edition, CL-Engineering 2003. (ISBN: 0-534-40617-3)
